attributes.action: NHS staff should be exempt from paying parking charges in order to work
attributes.additional_details: Just because NHS staff are not paid huge amounts and to make them pay over £400 per annum to park if far too much of their salary. Now that COVID-19 has finished why should they be made to pay again
attributes.background: Make all hospitals allow all NHS staff to park free

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Make parking for all NHS staff free all of the time.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307909
